titleStmt.title: The faythfull louers resolution being forsaken of a coy and faythles dame. To the tune of, My deere and only loue take heed.

notesStmt.note: Printe's name and date of publication from STC.
Verse - "Though booteles I must needs complaine".
In two parts, printed side by side; the second part has title: The coy maydens answere. To the same tune.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
